name: CHIP-8 Web Toolchain
description: An interpeter, disassembler, debugger, and compiler toolchain for the CHIP-8 virtual machine. Compiles a custom language to the CHIP-8 bytecode. Built in Rust and exposed to a web-interface via WebAssembly.

name: rs2
description: A mod for *Spyro 2*. Written in C, the mod hooks game functions to add a variety of new features, controlled by an in-game menu. Required extensive reverse-engineering of the game's functions and data structures with Ghidra.

name: spyro.run
description: An alternative frontend for *speedrun.com* leaderboards, with more advanced filtering/sorting. A Python script dumps the necessary data via the speedrun.com API, and is rendered by a React frontend.

name: OrbArena
description: A 3D game where the aim is to survive as long as possible, fighting off waves of enemies. Enemies become more numerous and aggressive as time goes on.

name: UE Target/Parry/Chase System
description: A combat system for Unreal Engine, where the player can target and parry enemies. Also includes an algorithm for enemies to chase the player.
